mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product VALUES( seq_product_prod_no.NEXTVAL, #{prodName}, #{prodDetail}, #{manuDate}, #{price}, #{fileName:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{stock} )
mapper.sql:
SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.price, p.reg_date, p.prod_detail, p.stock-NVL(COUNT(t.tran_no),0) stock, p.image_file FROM product p, transaction t
p.prod_no=t.prod_no(+)
AND prod_name LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND price >= ${searchKeyword}
AND price <= ${searchKeyword2}
GROUP BY p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.price, p.reg_date, p.prod_detail, p.stock, t.prod_no, p.image_file
p.stock-NVL(COUNT(t.tran_no),0) > 0
ORDER BY
prod_name price ${orderOption},
p.prod_no DESC
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM row_seq FROM ( ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <=${currentPage}*${pageSize} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN ${(currentPage-1)*pageSize+1} AND ${currentPage*pageSize}

SELECT r.cmt, r.reg_date , r.upd_date, r.user_id, r.reply_no FROM product p, reply r WHERE p.prod_no=r.prod_no(+) AND p.prod_no=#{value} AND cmt IS NOT NULL AND r.reply_no IN r.outer_reply ORDER BY r.reply_no
SELECT cmt, reg_date , upd_date, user_id, reply_no FROM reply WHERE cmt IS NOT NULL AND outer_reply IN #{value} AND reply_no NOT IN outer_reply ORDER BY reply_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply VALUES( seq_reply_reply_no.nextval, #{prodNo}, #{replyList[0].userId}, #{replyList[0].cmt:VARCHAR}, #{replyList[0].replyNo}, seq_reply_reply_no.currval, SYSDATE, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT prod_name FROM product WHERE prod_name LIKE '%${value}%'
SELECT p1.prod_no, p1.prod_name, p1.image_file FROM product p1, product p2 GROUP BY p1.prod_no, p1.prod_name, p1.image_file HAVING p1.prod_no IN MAX(p2.prod_no)

SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.image_file, it.tc stock FROM product p, (SELECT t.prod_no, ROWNUM itr, t.tc FROM (SELECT prod_no, count(*) tc FROM transaction GROUP BY prod_no ORDER BY tc DESC )t )it WHERE p.prod_no IN (it.prod_no) ORDER BY it.itr

SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.image_file FROM product p, (SELECT r.prod_no, ROWNUM irr FROM (SELECT prod_no, count(*) rc FROM reply GROUP BY prod_no ORDER BY rc DESC )r )ir WHERE irr IN 1 AND p.prod_no IN (ir.prod_no)
